actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a credit against income tax for businesses which provide free public Internet access.
short_title: National Free Public Internet Access Act of 2000

summary.text: National Free Public Internet Access Act of 2000 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a business a credit of up to $100,000 annually for providing free public Internet access.

titles.title: National Free Public Internet Access Act of 2000
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a credit against income tax for businesses which provide free public Internet access.
